# Zebra ZT220 CUPS Printing

This [External Repo](https://github.com/chrissyhroberts/Zebra_ZT220_CUPS) provides a method for printing via CUPS to a Zebra ZT220 printer (And other models most likely).

It includes a batch mode which will print stickers from a csv file, with QR Codes.
